name: Turntable.fm - Smallify your Chat!
description:
Make your chat much smaller.  Read more at once without having to scroll.

I recommend using this along with style 49559 for the best results.

My other styles (related):
style 54940
style 54879

Style created by my friend, user 54307:
style 49559
additional_info:
Version 1.1
Quick fix to make chat text wrap again.

Version 1.0
Tested in FF 7.0.1 and Chrome 14.0.bla.bla.bla
